definition: a secret look, appear as though from hiding
details:
noun
- a secret look
= synonyms: peek
- the short weak cry of a young bird
= synonyms: cheep
verb
- appear as though from hiding
= example: appear as though from hiding
- speak in a hesitant and high-pitched tone of voice
- make high-pitched sounds
= synonyms: chirp, chirrup, cheep
- cause to appear
= example: cause to appear
= synonyms: bring on
- look furtively
= example: look furtively
